casebody.data:
YAHUDAH WASHITAW OF EAST TERRA INDIANS, et al.
v.
PHH MORTGAGE CORPORATION, et al. 117P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 03, 2017 Shawn Singletary, for Yahudah Washitaw of East Terra Indians, et al. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C.

*752The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of April 2017 by Petitioners for Removal from State Court:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017."
